original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord and did not turn away from any of the sins of Jeroboam son of Nebat, which he had caused Israel to commit; he continued in them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 모든 죄에서 떠나지 아니하고 그 가운데 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord
and did not turn away from any of the sins
which he had caused Israel to commit;
